hero.description: Find out how you can easily report a crime. Our app allows you to quickly report crimes and incidents to improve community safety.

report.fs: All you need to do is fill out the short form below to help anyone else who wants information about this place.
report.title: Title

pageNotFound.description: The page you are looking for was moved, removed or might never existed.

comingSoon.title: We're coming soon.
comingSoon.description: Our website is under construction. We'll be here soon with our new awesome site.

quote.content: Thanks to this service, I feel more confident and more involved in the safety of my neighborhood. Together we can make our community even safer. Together we are strong!
quote.job: Deputy Director of Social Safety at Google Inc.

changeAvatar.uploadRequirements: Must be jpg, png or webp format. No NSFM allowed. No copyrighted images. Maximum of 512 x 512 pixels (resized automatically).
changeAvatar.removeInformation: You can remove this picture by clicking the button below. Don't forget to upload another though, or else you will have an N\A image in its place.
